title: Terra Chroma v1.01
description:
Puzzle your way through an Amazing Adventure!

Terra Chroma combines a riveting puzzle mechanic with RPG elements for a gameplay experience like no other! Players learn elemental magic skills to defeat increasingly challenging puzzles as they delve further into a rich story world.

Become an Alchromist, recruit characters to your team, learn new skills & powers, and travel a wild, diverse continent full of ever-changing obstacles that will challenge your puzzling skills!

Key Features:

- An inventive approach to touch screen puzzling where players cast different types of magic puzzle pieces to navigate across constantly evolving terrains filled with obstacles, enemies, and the unknown.

- Explore the massive, beautifully rendered world of Sunyata, full of exotic locales each with their own style, culture, and eccentric characters. Discover the powerful magic that holds Sunyata together and threatens to tear it apart!

- Develop your character's abilities by leveling up on different skills, increasing endurance, buying various items, and adding characters to your team to meet the changing challenges you encounter.

- Experience a grand adventures with hours of gameplay, a branching storyline, and an amazing journey across colors and puzzles as you help the combative citizens of Sunyata save their world!

What's New:

- Graphical bugfix

1.Copy 'com.MobiusDigital.TerraChromaR' folder to 'sdcard/Android/obb'
2.Install APK
3.Launch the game
